column4: is this just for a browser like firefox?  they have cool plugins to change proxy and there a web sites that list free proxy services
I have installed Privoxy on Ubuntu & it should do the same as the free proxy services if configured....I just dont know how to configure it
oh do you want to become the proxy server side?
yes
can you help ?
no I don't have time sorry,  it doesn't look hard and it's well documented http://www.privoxy.org/user-manual/index.html
already looked that shitty manual....it doesnt help
did you even view the current configuration files
yes & changed it as per the manual
did you configure your router to redirect the port used to your server running the listiner port
the manual does not state what settings need to be on the client connecting remotely....so I used the IP address given by the ISP
yes done that
your ip provided on wan will probly change you do know that don't you unless you have static ip from you service
I have static IP
ok what's your ip
feel free to pm it to me if privacy needed
do you have wireshark installed?
no....what's wireshark ?
it's a networking tool
see if you see the trafic from your client come in
check sudo iptables -L to verify you have all ports open
I have ping & it is coming great
ok try your clients browser on the port you use and see with wireshark if that's also visable or whatever port you use
ok got to go,  good luck
